fr.univnantes.lina.uima.util
Class UIMAUtilities

java.lang.Object
  fr.univnantes.lina.uima.util.UIMAUtilities

public class UIMAUtilities
extends java.lang.Object

Library of UIMA Utilities such as methods to get

from its string name

  • a view
  • an annotation type
  • a class
  • a feature
  • a feature getter method

or methods to invoke

  • an getter/setter method associated to a given annotation

or methods to create

  • annotations from its name and feature name to set
  • views

or methods to subiterate with FeatureConstraints

Take in charge the exceptions

Author:
hernandez

subiterator

public static org.apache.uima.cas.FSIterator subiterator(org.apache.uima.jcas.JCas aJCas,
                                                         org.apache.uima.jcas.tcas.Annotation contextAnnotation,
                                                         java.util.HashMap inputAnnotationHashMap,
                                                         boolean isStrict)
                                                  throws org.apache.uima.analysis_engine.AnalysisEngineProcessException
This method provides an iterator over typed annotations that either have an offset embedded in that of a given annotation in a document, or have the same offset as these annotation.

Parameters:
aJCas - the document in which stand the source and target annotations
contextAnnotation - the source annotation under which target annotations that have to be drawn out
inputAnnotationType - the type of the target annotations that have to be drawn out from the document under the source annotation
isStrict - the boolean that defines the offset matching, offsets strictly equal if isStrict is true, begin offsets greater or equal and end offsets less or equal otherwise.
Returns:
the iterator over the type theType annotations which stand under the annotation theAnnotation in the document theDocument should include the context annotation itself...
Throws:
org.apache.uima.analysis_engine.AnalysisEngineProcessException
